chapter.title: Getting started
chapter.para: The most recent official release of JBoss Messaging is available as a free download from the main JBoss messaging downloads page.

section.title: Directory overview
section.para: After you have downloaded the package, extract the archive content into a location of your choice.
Expanding the JBoss Messaging distribution creates a JBossMessaging-[release number] directory which contains the scoped archive, the source code, the examples and other documentation.

figure.title: A view of the JBoss Messaging installation directory

section.title: CVS Access
section.para: If you want to experiment with the latest developments you may checkout the latest code from the 5.0 head branch. Be aware that the information provided in this manual might then not be accurate. Check out the following wiki fot the latest instructions http://wiki.jboss.org/wiki/Wiki.jsp?page=JBossMessagingBuildInstructions
